title: From Confusion To Clarity - Vital Personal Growth In 30 Days Or Less
description: The purpose of this book is to bring people back to themselves as vehicles of higher consciousness, to demonstrate to others that despite all odds, they can rise above their circumstances, and in fact use them to become a larger version of themselves. From Confusion to Clarity, Vital Personal Growth in 30 Days or Less, contains 30 exercises that anyone can use in order to shift their conscious awareness of who they really are. Regardless of your circumstances, this book will empower you to create the life you deserve. The introduction to this book is written by world famous, Neale Donald Walsch, author of the Conversations with God series. Michele offers the reader a path to vital personal growth in 30 days or less.Click here for easy ordering http://www.createspace.com/3901205Now available on Amazon and Kindle at http://www.amazon.com/dp/B009LPMEJANow available at Barnes & Noble and Nook athttp://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/from-...
author: Michele  Harvey
